1.4.name: wordpress/colorcycle
1.4.description: ColorCycle is a gallery replacement plugin for WordPress. It adds Colorbox for image enlargements, and creates slideshows of attached images using the Cycle plugin for jQuery. The [gallery] shortcode is replaced with a Colorbox powered gallery. An additional shortcode [slideshow] is provided.
